name: Flippy Cat
description:
This is just a quick little casual game - really, it's my first seen all the way to the end.

I meant to release to a Game Jam, but missed the mark (by a couple weeks...). 

Have fun! Either try it in your browser or download it to play in Windows.

To play, launch a cat and shoot one of three weapons at it. The higher it goes and the more it spins, the higher the score!

  • Cannonball - straight smack
  • Buzz Saw - gives a little extra spin-action
  • Bomb - gives a little extra oomph but not as much spin and is a little slower

Leave a comment if you find it fun or leave one even if you think it's silly or dumb! All feedback is welcome.
